title: Chasuble

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of wool, 2:2 twill weave; embroidered with wool in chain and running stitches; couching and french knots.

medium_display: Wool, 2:2 twill weave; embroidered with wool in chain and running stitches; couching and French knots
